name: Th-e Dis-ea-se
description:
One night  you go to your room and go to bed. When you open your eyes you all of sudden got teleported to some dimension. Then you notice your a rectangle! Your hoping its because of the weird dimension your in. Your goal is to escape this dimension and hope that when you make it out you become...human.......

Sometimes when you collect a coin you get 2? So weird.

This game was made in 2 weeks for a game jam

Please considering subscribing to my channel. there will be more content when im done making more games!

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCuOh4fCML1vp6WFdD2YC5Eg
